RelatedSentence: The Church of Scotland has said it will play a role in healing any divisions caused by the independence referendum , after the Queen called on people of faith to work together for the social good of Scotland whatever the outcome .

RelatedSentence: In her unusual letter to the church 's annual General Assembly she recognised its role in holding the people of Scotland together .

RelatedSentence: So in this important year of referendum we pray that whatever the outcome , people of faith and people of goodwill will work together for the social good of Scotland .

Prof Alan Trench , an honorary fellow in the school of social and political science at Edinburgh University , said the Queen was obviously concerned that things could get very nasty as the referendum approaches .
